#include <stdio.h>

int main(void) {
	int T;
	scanf("%d",&T);
	while(T--)
	{
		long long N,count=0;
		scanf("%lld",&N);
		while(N)
		{
			int t=N%10;
			switch(t)
			{
				case 0:count+=18;break;
				case 1:count+=4;break;
				case 2:count+=10;break;
				case 3:count+=10;break;
				case 4:count+=8;break;
				case 5:count+=10;break;
				case 6:count+=18;break;
				case 7:count+=9;break;
				case 8:count+=21;break;
				case 9:count+=18;break;
			}
			N/=10;
		}
		printf("%lld\n",count);
	}
	return 0;
}
